attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the 1950s there were peaple that lived in prefabs but now there are mobile homes much superior to live in and a lot cheaper than bed and breakfast travellors live in less sulubrious surroundings what im saying is house peaple in these mobile homes which would keep familys together and ease the housing crises
